verses.verse: He <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob<s%> has taken <S%H3947>away<s%> all that was our <S%H1>father<s%>'s. From that which was our <S%H1>father<s%>'s, has he <S%H6213>gotten<s%> all this <S%H3519>wealth.<s%>"
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6440>expression<s%> on <S%H3837>Laban<s%>'s <S%H8543>face,<s%> and, behold, it was not toward him as <S%H8032>before.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and to your <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> and I will be with you."
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> to his <S%H6629>flock,<s%>

and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> "I see the expression on your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6440>face,<s%> that it is not toward me <S%H8543>as<s%> <S%H8032>before;<s%> but the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> has been with <S%H1961>me.<s%>
<S%H859>You<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H859>your<s%> father with all of my <S%H1>strength.<s%>

Your <S%H1>father<s%> has <S%H2048>deceived<s%> <S%H2498>me,<s%> and changed my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times,<s%> but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>didn't<s%> allow him to <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H5978>me.<s%>

If he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H5348>this,<s%> 'The speckled will be your <S%H7939>wages,<s%>' then all the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H5348>speckled.<s%> If he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6124>this,<s%> 'The streaked will be your <S%H7939>wages,<s%>' then all the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H6124>streaked.<s%>
Thus <S%H430>God<s%> has taken <S%H5337>away<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and given them to <S%H5414>me.<s%>

It happened <S%H6256>during<s%> <S%H3179>mating<s%> <S%H6256>season<s%> that I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H6260>behold,<s%> the male goats which <S%H5927>leaped<s%> on the <S%H6629>flock<s%> were <S%H6124>streaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>grizzled.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me in the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H3290><s%> 'Jacob,' and I <S%H559>said,<s%> 'Here I am.'

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5375><s%> 'Now lift up your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold,<s%> all the male <S%H6260>goats<s%> which <S%H5927>leap<s%> on the <S%H6629>flock<s%> are <S%H6124>streaked,<s%> <S%H5348>speckled,<s%> and <S%H1261>grizzled,<s%> for I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that <S%H3837>Laban<s%> does to <S%H6213>you.<s%>

I am the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> where you <S%H4886>anointed<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> where you <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H6965>me.<s%> Now arise, get <S%H3318>out<s%> from this <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4138>birth.<s%>'"

<S%H7354>Rachel<s%> and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> "Is there yet any <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us in our <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house?<s%>
<S%H2803>Aren't<s%> we accounted by him as <S%H5237>foreigners?<s%> For he has <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H398>us,<s%> and has also quite <S%H398>devoured<s%> our <S%H3701>money.<s%>

For all the <S%H6239>riches<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5337>taken<s%> away from our <S%H1>father,<s%> that is ours and our <S%H1121>children<s%>'s. Now <S%H430>then,<s%> whatever God has <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> do."
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H5375>set<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H802>wives<s%> on the <S%H1581>camels,<s%>

and he took <S%H5090>away<s%> all his <S%H4735>livestock,<s%> and all his <S%H7399>possessions<s%> which he had <S%H7408>gathered,<s%> including the <S%H4735>livestock<s%> which he <S%H7075>had<s%> <S%H7408>gained<s%> in <S%H6307>Paddan<s%> <S%H935>Aram,<s%> to go to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
Now <S%H3837>Laban<s%> had <S%H1980>gone<s%> to <S%H1494>shear<s%> his <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H1589>stole<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim<s%> that were her <S%H1>father<s%>'s.
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3820>deceived<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in <S%H5921>that<s%> he <S%H1097>didn't<s%> tell him <S%H5921>that<s%> he was running <S%H1272>away.<s%>

So he <S%H1272>fled<s%> with all that he <S%H6965>had.<s%> He rose up, passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5104>River,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> was <S%H5046>told<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H1272>fled.<s%>

He <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H251>relatives<s%> with <S%H7291>him,<s%> and pursued after <S%H310>him<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey.<s%> He <S%H1692>overtook<s%> him in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8104>him,<s%> "Take heed to yourself that you <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak <S%H5973>to<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5704>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%>"

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> caught <S%H5381>up<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H8628>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban<s%> with his <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H8628>encamped<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "What have you <S%H6213>done,<s%> that you have <S%H1589>deceived<s%> <S%H3824>me,<s%> and carried <S%H5090>away<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters<s%> like <S%H7617>captives<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword?<s%>

Why did <S%H1272>you<s%> <S%H1589>flee<s%> <S%H2244>secretly,<s%> and deceive <S%H5046>me,<s%> and didn't tell <S%H7971>me,<s%> that I might have sent you away with <S%H8057>mirth<s%> and with <S%H7892>songs,<s%> with <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and with <S%H3658>harp;<s%>
and <S%H5203>didn't<s%> allow me to <S%H5401>kiss<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters?<s%> Now have you <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5528>foolishly.<s%>

It <S%H3426>is<s%> in the <S%H410>power<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H6213>to<s%> <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> but the God of your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to me last <S%H570>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104><s%> 'Take heed to yourself that you <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad.<s%>'

<S%H1980>Now,<s%> you want to be <S%H1980>gone,<s%> because you <S%H3700>greatly<s%> <S%H3700>longed<s%> for your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> but why have you <S%H1589>stolen<s%> my <S%H430>gods?<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H559>"Because<s%> I was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> for I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435><s%> 'Lest you should take your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from me by <S%H1497>force.<s%>'

<S%H834>Anyone<s%> you <S%H4672>find<s%> your <S%H430>gods<s%> with shall not <S%H2421>live.<s%> <S%H5048>Before<s%> our <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H5234>discern<s%> what is yours with <S%H3947>me,<s%> and take <S%H3290>it.<s%>" For Jacob <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know that <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had stolen <S%H1589>them.<s%>

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H168>tent,<s%> into <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H168>tent,<s%> and into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> female <S%H519>servants;<s%> but he <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find <S%H3318>them.<s%> He went out of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>'s <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Now <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H8655>teraphim,<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> them in the <S%H1581>camel<s%>'s <S%H3733>saddle,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> on <S%H3837>them.<s%> Laban <S%H4959>felt<s%> about all the <S%H168>tent,<s%> but <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find them.

She <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H113>"Don't<s%> let my lord be <S%H2734>angry<s%> that I <S%H3201>can't<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> before <S%H6440>you;<s%> for <S%H1870>I<s%>'m having my <S%H802>period.<s%>" He <S%H2664>searched,<s%> but <S%H4672>didn't<s%> find the <S%H8655>teraphim.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and <S%H7378>argued<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban.<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H559>"What<s%> is my <S%H6588>trespass?<s%> What is my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> that you have hotly <S%H1814>pursued<s%> after <S%H310>me?<s%>

<S%H3290>Now<s%> that <S%H2734>you<s%> have <S%H7378>felt<s%> around <S%H3837>in<s%> <S%H3290>all<s%> <S%H6030>my<s%> <S%H3837>stuff,<s%> <S%H559>what<s%> have you <S%H6588>found<s%> of all your <S%H2403>household<s%> <S%H1814>stuff?<s%> Set it here before my relatives and your <S%H310>relatives,<s%> that they may judge between us two.

"These <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> I have been with <S%H7353>you.<s%> Your ewes and your female <S%H5795>goats<s%> have not cast their <S%H7921>young,<s%> and I <S%H398>haven't<s%> eaten the <S%H352>rams<s%> of your <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

That which was <S%H2966>torn<s%> of <S%H935>animals,<s%> I didn't bring to <S%H2398>you.<s%> I bore its loss. Of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> you <S%H1245>required<s%> <S%H1589>it,<s%> whether stolen by <S%H3117>day<s%> or <S%H1589>stolen<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

This was my <S%H3117>situation:<s%> in the day the <S%H2721>drought<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H7140>me,<s%> and the frost by <S%H3915>night;<s%> and my <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H5074>fled<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

These <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> I have been in your <S%H1004>house.<s%> I served <S%H5647>you<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> for your <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and you have <S%H2498>changed<s%> my <S%H4909>wages<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4489>times.<s%>

<S%H3884>Unless<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> had been with <S%H7971>me,<s%> surely now you would have sent me away <S%H7387>empty.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and <S%H3198>rebuked<s%> you last <S%H570>night.<s%>"

<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> are my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> are my <S%H1121>children,<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> are my <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and all that you <S%H7200>see<s%> is <S%H6213>mine:<s%> and what can I do this <S%H3117>day<s%> to these my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to their <S%H1121>children<s%> whom they have <S%H3205>borne?<s%>
Now <S%H3772>come,<s%> let us make a <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H3212>you<s%> and <S%H5707>I;<s%> and let it be for a witness between me and you."
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H68>stone,<s%> and set it <S%H7311>up<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H3950>"Gather<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>" They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1530>heap.<s%> They <S%H398>ate<s%> there by the <S%H1530>heap.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it Jegar <S%H3026>Sahadutha,<s%> but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H1567>Galeed.<s%>
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This <S%H1530>heap<s%> is <S%H5707>witness<s%> between me and you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>" Therefore it <S%H7121>was<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1567>Galeed<s%>
and <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> between me and <S%H5641>you,<s%> when we are absent <S%H376>one<s%> from <S%H7453>another.<s%>

If you <S%H6031>afflict<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> or if you <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H5921>besides<s%> my <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> is with <S%H7200>us;<s%> behold, <S%H430>God<s%> is witness between me and <S%H5707>you.<s%>"
<S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "See this <S%H1530>heap,<s%> and see the <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> which I have set between me and <S%H3384>you.<s%>

May this <S%H1530>heap<s%> be a <S%H5713>witness,<s%> and the <S%H4676>pillar<s%> be a <S%H5713>witness,<s%> that I will not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H1530>heap<s%> to <S%H5674>you,<s%> and that you will not pass over this <S%H1530>heap<s%> and this <S%H4676>pillar<s%> to <S%H7451>me,<s%> for harm.

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> between <S%H3290>us.<s%>" Then Jacob <S%H7650>swore<s%> by the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H251>relatives<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%> They <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and stayed all <S%H3885>night<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

<S%H7925>Early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> rose <S%H7925>up,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3837>them.<s%> Laban <S%H3212>departed<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
